content: pony bead weighted blanket materials needed acrylic yarn - worsted weight plastic pony beads found at places like hobby lobby or michaels the amount of beads needed will vary if your blanket will be made for an adult or child crochet hooks - 4mm 2 75mm will interchange both hook sizes throughout project abbreviations throughout pattern half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet round 1 with 4mm crochet hook chain multiples of 2+1 example chain 44 plus 1 stitch so your total stitch count equals 45 stitches half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in the 3rd chain from your hook and every stitch across round 2 switch to your 2 75mm crochet hook chain 2 half_double_crochet into next stitch *pick up one pony bead onto your crochet hook and single_crochet single_crochet into the next stitch and slip the yarn through the bead and remaining stitch on the hook half_double_crochet next stitch* repeat the steps that are in between the * across the entire row end with one last half_double_crochet round 3 with the 2 75mm hook chain 2 switch back to the 4mm crochet hook and half_double_crochet each stitch across repeat rounds 2 and 3 until your blanket has reached the desired length ending on round 3 feel free to create a border around the entire blanket with single crochets
